WizzVPS Managed VPS - 50% Off Monthly (recurring) All VPS Plans starting from Cyber Monday and will remain for the next 72 hours


WizzSolutions.com Group LLC, is the leader in high bandwidth and speciality hosting solutions. Since 2010 WizzSolutions has offered fully managed dedicated, VPS hosting, and server administration services. In 2014 we launched our Premium SSD VPS services based out of Miami, FL in the Terremark NAP of the Americas flagship data center. Most recently we have launched infrastructure in Equinix LA1. Our Premium SSD VPS services are based on the latest most premium HP Intel hardware, include backups and Raid-10 SSD disk arrays. We are available 24/7 and our management team has over 25 years combined experience in the hosting industry. We are excited to be able to offer a premium affordable SSD VPS service that you can trust and stand by.


WizzVPS Service Overview:
Fully Managed 24/7 Helpdesk and Livechat Support
Free Securing and Hardening with WizzSecure Lite
Free Account and Data Migration Services
Free Monitoring
Instant Activation, Receive Your Server Details Minutes After Order
SolusVM Premium Linux VPS Control Panel
Miami, FL NAP of the Americas Datacenter
Los Angeles, CA Equinix LA 1 Datacenter
SSD Raid-10 Full SSD Disk Architecture
Backups Included
